name: Sneaky Snack
description:
Story

You are a cat.
You aren't hungry, but the smell of a medium rare fish wakes you up.

Sneak past those pesky guards and get the fish!

Controls Movement
KeyboardControllerMove Up
W or ↑
Directional Pad Up
Move Down
S or ↓
Directional Pad DownMove Left
A or ←
Directional Pad LeftMove Right
D or →
Directional Pad Right Minimum requirements

This game was made in a laptop with the following specs:

  • CPU: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2430M CPU @ 2.40GHz
  • RAM: At least 100 MB
  • Graphics card: Intel HD Graphics 3000
  • And a minimum of 40 MB of disk space

Level 11 tended to lag quite a bit
